summary: This mod adds new AI Packages to Serana so that she is not as aggressive when you are in sneak mode. Alternate version removes her annoying Raise Dead spells and reduces the frequency of her detection dialogue (who's there, there you are, show yourself, ect). Does not change Serana's appearance, so you can use any body or face mod you like.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds new AI Packages to Serana so that she is not as aggressive when you are in sneak mode. She will no longer charge ahead and attack as soon as you are detected and will instead wait until your enemy's are in a close radius before engaging in combat.

[i]I have made a point not to edit her attributes directly, so you can choose any body or face mod you like along with this mod.[/i]

[color=Orange]I have also reduced the overall frequency of her [b]Detection Dialogue[/b] by [/color][color=red]75%[/color] [color=orange]and removed most of her comments when you are sneaking. So Serana won't shout out [/color][b]"Who's there!" or "Where'd you come from!" [/b][color=orange]every time you are detected.[/color]

[i]I have created two versions of this mod for your own personal preference.[/i]


[color=ORANGE][b]Version 1:[/b][/color][color=LIGHTGREEN] Only includes the sneak AI package edits. [/color]
[i]This version keeps all of her existing spells intact.[/i]

[color=ORANGE][b]Version 2:[/b][/color][color=LIGHTGREEN] Adds sneak AI package edits, removes all her 'Raise Dead' and 'AOE' spells and adds new spells to her list[/color] [color=ORANGE](Heal Self, Bat Cloak, Ward, Icy Spear, and Thunderbolt). [/color][color=RED]RECOMMENDED FOR STEALTH GAMEPLAY[/color]

[b][color=yellow]
* It is recommended to enable this mod [/color][color=red]before you release Serana from her tomb[/color], [color=yellow]so that her leveling scripts are still active. This will ensure that her 'Raise Dead' spells are properly removed.[/color]

I have added an additional script to help remove her spells if you have already started the DG questline. If that doesn't work, you may need to use the console and manually remove them.

00101060 (RevenantRightHand) <<<<< Try this one, seems to be the issue with an already leveled up Serana.
02011F35 ( DLC1RaiseZombieRightHand )
000C969E ( RaiseZombieLeftHand )
000CAB64 ( ReanimateCorpseLeftHand )
000CAB66 ( RevenantLeftHand )

[color=yellow]* For best results, use BOSS to sort load order.[/color][/b]


[u][b]Updates:[/b][/u]
[b]
3.0

[/b]- Fixed spell damage problem, Serana's new spells now level with player.
- Fixed Ward and Heal Spells, you should now see Serana use them more frequently.

[b]2.9

[/b]- Minor edits to new spells to help improve frequency of use.
- Fixed invalid script errors. Will no longer see errors in log.

[b]2.8[/b]

- Removed Ice Storm & Chain Lightning, replaced with Thunderbolt & Icy Spear.
- Additional tweaks to remove raise dead spells.
- Revised scripts.

[b]2.7[/b]

- Added friendly conditions to AOE Shock and Frost spells (will no longer aggro your companions when hit).
- Completely leveled her Bat Cloak, Ward, and Healing spells for higher level use.

[b]2.4 - 2.6[/b]

- Removed 'Chain lightning' Spell. Added Lightning Bolt II (Changed in leveling script only).
- Removed Raise Dead (Right Hand) Spell Effects to eliminate Serana's use (changed to heal spell).
- Removed most of her detection dialogue comments when sneaking.
- Reduced her detection dialogue by 75% for all of Serana's comments.
(Who's there, Where'd you come from, Found you, I knew it, Show yourself, ect.)


[u][b]Load Order:[/b][/u]

The order is less important for the 'AI Only' version. Just make sure it runs after any mods like AFT or UFO.

For the 'No Raise Dead' version, run this as late in your load order as possible. Preferably after any other Dawnguard mods.


[u][b]Compatibility:[/b][/u]

- [color=GREEN]Compatible with UFO[/color]

- [color=GREEN]Compatible with AFT (Use AFT Patch File)[/color]
[color=RED]* Load 'Sneaky_Serana.esp' file after AFT.
[color=RED]* Select 'Combat' option (reccomended to use General or Magic).[/color]
* I did not edit the 'Follow Far' option. This will use AFT's AI package if selected.[/color]

- [color=GREEN]Compatible with Serana Dialogue Edit[/color]
[color=RED]* Load 'Sneaky_Serana.esp' before Serana Dialogue Edit file.[/color]
[color=RED]* Reduced detection dialogue will not work with this mod, only spells and AI packages.[/color]



[u][b]Requirements:[/b][/u]

- Dawnguard
- For v2 load file after all other Dawnguard mods.



[u][b]Comments:[/b][/u]

All of the features I have implemented have been done without editing her form ID directly, letting you chose any custom appearance mod you like. Enjoy!



[u][b]Installation: [/b][/u]

1. Use NMM installer.
2. Install manually by adding Sneaky_Serana.esp to Skyrim/Data folder.
Add DLC1SeranaLevelingScript.pex & DLC1RemoveSeranaZombies.pex to Data/Scripts folder.



[u][b]Uninstall:[/b][/u]

1. Deactivate with NMM.
2. Remove Sneaky_Serana from Skyrim/Data folder.
Remove DLC1SeranaLevelingScript.pex & DLC1RemoveSeranaZombies.pex from Data/Scripts folder.
